mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_merchant (VENDOR_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, LOGO_URL, CREATE_TIME, MOBILE, CONTACT_PERSON, BANK_NAME, BANK_ACCOUNT, BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, CITY_ID, ADDRESS, EMAIL, TAX_RATE, SERVICE_CHARGE, MEAL_STYLE) values (#{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRate,jdbcType=REAL} , #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=REAL},#{mealStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update rc_merchant
VENDOR_ID = #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGO_URL = #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_SCORE = #{productScore,jdbcType=REAL},
DELIVERY_SCORE = #{deliveryScore,jdbcType=REAL},
SERVICE_SCORE = #{serviceScore,jdbcType=REAL},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=REAL},
SERVICE_CHARGE = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=REAL},
MEAL_STYLE = #{mealStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select MERCHANT_ID, VENDOR_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, LOGO_URL, CREATE_TIME, MOBILE, DEL_FLAG, CONTACT_PERSON, PRODUCT_SCORE, DELIVERY_SCORE, SERVICE_SCORE, BANK_NAME, BANK_ACCOUNT, BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, CITY_ID, ADDRESS, EMAIL, TAX_RATE, SERVICE_CHARGE, MEAL_STYLE from rc_merchant where MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
